channel.title: Data Visualization Camp - UOM Research Week 2023
channel.description: Recent content on Data Visualization Camp - UOM Research Week 2023
channel.copyright: Priyanga D. Talagala - All rights reserved

item.title: Picturing Research Landscapes
item.description: Session 1: Picturing Research Landscapes: Unearthing Gaps through Data and Literature Visualization Welcome and Introduction to the Series of Workshops Brief on the objectives of the event, expected outcomes, and brief about the various sessions planned for the day.

item.title: Data Narratives with R
item.description: Session 2: An Open-source Odyssey: Crafting Data Narratives with R **Introduction to Data Visualization Tools in R ** Workshop Materials Install R and RStudio Install R packages

item.title: SmartPLS SEM Graph in Focus
item.description: Session 3: SmartPLS SEM Graph in Focus: Hypothesis Testing through Illustrative Designing Introduction to SmartPLS and Structural Equation Modeling Overview of the function and importance of SmartPLS; a brief explanation of Structural Equation Modeling (SEM), and its application in various domains.

item.title: Panel Discussion
item.description: Data Visualization for Knowledge Creation: Navigating the Unchartered Landscape of the Future Discussions on the current landscape and prospects of data visualization in various fields, sharing insights from their respective fields.

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: This data visualization camp is dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for everyone. This code of conduct applies to all the spaces, including online workshops, Twitter, mailing lists, both online and offline.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Registration: To register for the event, please click on the following link: Registration Form Contact Information: For any further information or inquiries, please contact Dr. Nayani Gunawardhana

item.title: Hotspots of Activity
item.description: Exhibition on tools for visualization and research productivity Note-taking tools Collaborative tools Version controlling tools Graphic tools Research management tools Additional details will be provided shortly.
